channel.title: Help with server going online.. Please read!
channel.description:
Right, I have used port checker.. and my port "34594" is open... I have a No-Ip Address and its currnet and needs no update. I type in my username and password to log onto my server and it says.. "Connecting to extremepk1.no-ip.org on port 43594"
But then it always says "Error connecting to server". Does anyone know what the problem is? If so do you know how to fix this?
Thankyou, All help apprechiated. Jake :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2009, 09:45:38 pm[/size][hr]Im sorry, I mean the port is "43594" not 34593

Thanks guys sorted

item.title: Help with server going online.. Please read!
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:3, topic:286190”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=378519.msg2846980#msg2846980 date=1246333749]
You have to use your localhost or 127.0.0.1 and your IP adress. Others use your no-ip
[/quote]
He doesnt not have to. If the no-ip adress does not work for him it will not work for anybody.[/quote]

Don’t give out bad advice, he was right. You log into localhost not your own ip address.

Read full topic
